#include<iostream>
#include<fstream>
#define in cin
#define out cout
using namespace std;
int main(){
    #ifndef ONLINE_JUDGE
    ifstream in("test.in");
    ofstream out("test.out");
    #endif
    int t,n; in>>t;
    while(t--){
        in>>n;
        long long ans=0;
        while(n>1){
            ans+=(n/2)*2;
            n=n/2+n%2;
        }
        ans+=n;
        out<<ans<<'\n';
    }
    return 0;
}
